title: Chicanas/os and Latinos in Education: Policy, Practice, and Challenges to Equity
description: An overview of the experiences, challenges, and opportunities for educating Chicano/Latino students. This course unpacks the socioeconomic and systematic factors that underlie these data. Further, to understand this persistent phenomenon and explore approaches to altering the current pathway of this group, this course will provide a comprehensive overview of Chicana/o-Latina/o students at every state in the P–20 education continuum. Prerequisites: upper-division standing.
